article_title: Galloway man now charged with murder in dad's death
article_text: We have used your information to see if you have a subscription with us. So far we have not found one. If you feel you are currently subscribed please click on the button to attempt to find your account.

og.description: GALLOWAY TOWNSHIP — A township man arrested this weekend in the slaying of his father had charges against him upgraded to murder Monday.
